comments.comment: Hi mauss_nnoe, could you please share a test case or a sample project to reproduce the issue? Thank you.

Hi, 
I don't have a sample project or other SOAP Service which reproduces this problem. 

This is a restricted SOAP Service only available inside a decentralized Healthcare Network.

It does not happen with Java 15, it started only with Java 16.
